title: patch 6.20 update error
body: Unspecific error occurred. how do i fix this????

replies.body: ISSUES PATCHING! We have been up to date on patches and it asked for one now but at 33% its says "Unspecified error occurred.. Check Log Notes" ????

There was an issue where some players were failing to patch.  Make sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for any live issues.  Everything should be okay now!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PGLxWAfw,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2016-10-08T20:22:42.990+0000)
>
> There was an issue where some players were failing to patch.  Make sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for any live issues.  Everything should be okay now!

yeah, everything is good now :)

I was having the same issue however as stated below it's a NA region problem. I'm gunna just keep trying to download in NA. Riot has just acknowledged there is an issue and is issuing a fix as of 2:20 CT.
After about 5 attempts hitting retry on the download I got through. Just keep at it
Didn't worked for me it did patch but when i came back NA same error..
I've been having the same problem but it hasn't fixed itself like everyone else has said theirs had

Having same issue, i even reinstalled the game to see what would happen and its completely locked me out. i did notice however that my antivirus was trying to nuke my launcher which i fixed before reinstalling but it didn't do anything to help the issue.
yea i reinstalled too, just found out that AVG was causing the problem so i turned off -__-

I had this error a couple of minutes ago, I was searching through the web and found nothing useful. Then I realized that my computer wasn't fully updated and it was stopping the patch @33%. So make sure your computer is up to date. I have Windows 10! Good Luck Sir!!! or Miss!!!
I switched to EUW but it is still not patching
are the NA servers down or something? my launcher says calculating differences l 1 filed scanned 33% then a message pops up saying _Update Failed_  please check logs {{summoner:3}} NotLikeThis
same problem here, says patch error and to check log notes?? anyone have a solution? I tried to repair the launcher but it still isn't working

Riot please help

I followed one of the solutions from a while back and deleted some files, now i can't find them and League wont update

WAIT: if you retry many times, it will work
ty god
Im also having this problem. Tried a bunch of common things I've found online to try to fix it and it still wont work.
im having the same problem

I am having the same problem

Edit: After 4 or 5 retries after error, the patch completed
apparently i fixed it by waiting then pressing ok to the error. then the launch button appeared
only asks me to "retry" and it keeps asking.
well its still failed update on my screen :(

Its only happenning on NA server. Switching to EU i was able to patch. The patcher failed to enumerate the update :
